content: w/ filling of your choice hat round 24 w/ mc working in the back loops only repeat round 6 join w/ slip_stitch 16 single_crochet round 25 chain 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 12 single_crochet rnds 26-27 repeat round 6 then stuff w/ filling of your choice round 28 chain 1 single_crochet in next st single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 8 single_crochet round 29 repeat round 6 round 30 chain 1 single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 4 single_crochet stuff w/ filling of your choice finish off brim round 1 w/ mc and point of hat facing you join w/ single_crochet in any free loop from the remaining front loops not worked in round 24 2 single_crochet in next free loop single_crochet in next free loop 2 single_crochet in next free loop around join w/ slip_stitch 24 single_crochet round 2 repeat round 4 of body 32 single_crochet round 3 chain 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch finish off 40 single_crochet arms make 2 round 1 w/ mc chain 4 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each chain across then single_crochet in the free loops on the other side of the chain join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 6 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch 9 single_crochet rnds 3-6 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch fold last round in half and slip_stitch to seam it closed finish off leaving a 6 tail using a tapestry needle sew to body terminology abbreviation full term chain chain decrease decrease round round single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch copyright © 2005 by patti gonsalves all
